title.narrative: Proyecto de Construcción de Sistemas de Agua y Saneamiento para Pequeñas Ciudade
Water and Sanitation System Construction Project for Small Cities and Rural and

description.narrative: El programa tiene como objetivo mejorar la calidad y ampliar el acceso a los servicios de agua y saneamiento en pequeñas ciudades y comunidades rurales e indígena.
The purpose of the program is to improve the quality and expand the access to water and sanitation services in small cities and rural and indigenous communities.
Commitment in fourth quarter of 2015
Disbursement in fourth quarter of 2020
Disbursement in fourth quarter of 2021
Disbursement in second quarter of 2019
Disbursement in third quarter of 2021
Interest repayment in first quarter of 2020
Interest repayment in first quarter of 2021
Interest repayment in third quarter of 2019
Interest repayment in third quarter of 2020
Interest repayment in third quarter of 2021
